title: Leading gaming content on Twitch H1 2019 , by hours watched
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
Games League of Legends has the highest Number of hours watched and World of Warcraft has the lowest Number of hours watched.
The maximum Games League of Legends has got 4.32 times higher Number of hours watched than the minimum Games World of Warcraft.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Games in the x axis and Number of hours watched in the y axis.
The maximum Number of hours watched 512.3 is found at Games League of Legends and the minimum is found at World of Warcraft where Games is 118.5.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
Games League of Legends has the highest Number of hours watched and World of Warcraft has the lowest Number of hours watched.
The maximum Games League of Legends has got 4.32 times higher Number of hours watched than the minimum Games World of Warcraft.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Games in the x axis and Number of hours watched in the y axis.
The Number of hours watched is appeared to be the highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
Games Fortnite has the second highest value for Number of hours watched.
The Number of hours watched of Games World of Warcraft is 4.32% smaller than the maximum value at League of Legends.
The Games League of Legends has the highest Number of hours watched, followed by Fortnite, and Just Chatting. Down to the Games World of Warcraft which is the lowest.
The highest value 512.3 at League of Legends is almost 1.98 times larger than the average value 258.19.
